overview: Bathing Your Friend's Dirty Mama - Leigh Darby's son Jason and his friend Jordi were busted stealing Leigh's car for a night on the town. Now as punishment Leigh is making them do chores around the house.  Hold The Phone, Not The Moan - Emma Butt wants to know why she never sees her stepson, Jordi El Nino Polla, anymore. Emma just wants Jordi to be home more often.  My Friend's Blindfolded Mom - Jewels plans a special evening for her and her husband. She waits for him the jacuzzi, blindfolded and masturbating, when her son's friend Ryan drops by.  Midnight Milk - Diamond is having her son over for dinner when the doorbell rings. It's Sean, her son's best friend. Then she leaves the guys to hang out together.  MILFer Madness - Richelle is a mom, a housewife and drug dealer and she hooks up all of her son's friends with that sweet Mary Jane whenever they want! She offers the young broke man some of her goods in exchange for sex.
title: MILF Mayhem 2
